oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Benedict with grandchild and parents in Mayor West’s office, 1962 November 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Andrew Benedict with grandchild and parents (Mr. and Mrs. Andrew Bell “Buddy” Benedict III) in Mayor Ben West’s office on November 18th, 1962. Andrew Bell Benedict, Jr. was a distinguished leader of First American National Bank who held important positions within the American Bankers Association. Benedict was known as the “People’s Banker” for his personal touch during his long tenure at the helm of the bank. He was friends with many of the nation’s leading bankers in the decades after WWII. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
